content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.25 > Section 82.25.015 82.25.010 << 82.25.015 >> 82.25.020 PDF RCW 82.25.015 Foundational public health services account. The foundational public health services account is created in the state treasury. Half of all of the moneys collected from the tax imposed on vapor products under RCW 66.44.010 must be deposited into the account. Moneys in the account may be spent only after appropriation. Moneys in the account are to be used to fund foundational health services. [ 2023 c 435 s 9 ; 2019 c 445 s 103 .] NOTES: Effective date — 2023 c 435: See note following RCW 43.79.570 . Automatic expiration date and tax preference performance statement exemption — 2019 c 445: See note following RCW 82.08.0318 .
